description: Confusion or bewilderment - attention snagged on inconsistency, showing as a puzzled frown and small orientation gestures.
actor_description: I can't make it line up. The pieces refuse to click together, and the harder I try to force it, the more wrong it feels. I keep replaying what I just saw or heard, looking for the missing step.
description_text: {actor}'s brow knits and their head tilts slightly, a puzzled frown settling in as if they're trying to re-parse what's in front of them.

alternate_descriptions.auditory: I hear a hesitant pause—maybe a small “wait” or a questioning hum—like {actor} is checking their own understanding out loud.
alternate_descriptions.tactile: Close to {actor}, there's a stop-start quality—micro-pauses and recalibration, as if their attention keeps catching on a snag.
